attributes.action: Put a price freeze on petrol and diesel
attributes.additional_details: The current fule sition on petrol and diesel is cripling evry one and the price can be different from up to 20p from garage to garage. This needs to be stoped a profit cap or something needs to be implemented to keep prices fair for the economy
attributes.background: To step in and stop the high and unfair fule prises that we see at the pumps and cap them prices so the current situion dos not destroy the economy

rejection.details:
The Government is not directly responsible for the price of fuel, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Set up an independent regulator to monitor and regulate vehicle fuel pricing: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605282

Hold an inquiry into fuel prices and introduce increased regulation: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603624

We have also published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Reduce fuel duty and VAT by 40% for a period of 2 years: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089
